name: Baby Don't Cry (CLRed)
description: Top-Down action-adventure game where player played as a father carried a newborn baby trying to survive in the post-apocalyptic world. Save your infected wife, you must  go to the laboratory to find the virus inhibitor. The lab is full of extremely sound-sensitive zombies, so you need to pay extra attention to the noises. you need to hold your breath as you go. In some occasion, your baby will cry out loud and draw attentions to zombies when he feel hungry. Please choose your route of action carefully to avoid the sound to wake up the sleeping zombies, and do not forget to feed your baby in time!
